subject: Travel Insurance Request - Silver Plan
body:
Hello, I need travel insurance for an outbound trip. Details:
- Scope: Worldwide
- Plan: Silver ($50,000 coverage)
- Duration: 10 days
- Travel dates: 2025-11-01 to 2025-11-10
- Travellers: 1
- Name: John Doe
- Passport: AB1234567

Please process this request.

Thank you
